import styles from './AboutLaFlora.module.scss'; import bgImage from "../../../assets/images/img_background_about_laFlora.png" import illustration from "../../../assets/images/img_illustration_about.png" const AboutLaFlora = () => { return (
About La Flora

Locally Crafted.
Lovingly Delivered

At La Flora Boutique, we believe flowers do more than decorate – they connect, comfort, and celebrate life’s most meaningful moments. Based in the heart of Los Angeles, we create elegant, handcrafted bouquets designed to leave a lasting impression. Each bouquet is carefully handcrafted by local florists using the freshest seasonal blooms. Whether you're sending love, thanks, or simply brightening a space – every petal holds purpose.

) } export default AboutLaFlora;
